item.description: Automattic is an awesome company and culture. Welcome to the team! Best, tony

item.title: By: phil b.
item.dc:creator: phil b.
item.description: Welcome to the team! Matt and Toni and company are excited to have you on board. I look forward to hearing about your work. phil.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the team! Matt and Toni and company are excited to have you on board. I look forward to hearing about your work.
phil.

item.title: By: Shahzad khan
item.dc:creator: Shahzad khan
item.description:
Congrats on joining Automattic, one of the best things I've known to date !
Wordpress rox
peace -mE
item.content:encoded:

peace

item.title: By: Donncha O Caoimh
item.dc:creator: Donncha O Caoimh
item.description: Welcome on board Joseph! Looking forward to working with you!
item.content:encoded: Welcome on board Joseph! Looking forward to working with you!

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description:
Wow! I wish my boss was that gracious when I left my last company in order to come to China.
Congratulations on the job change. I am sure that the World of WordPress will be better for it.
item.content:encoded:
Wow! I wish my boss was that gracious when I left my last company in order to come to China.

Congratulations on the job change. I am sure that the World of WordPress will be better for it.

item.title: By: Warboss
item.dc:creator: Warboss
item.description:
Well, Jim seems to be handling that well...
Oh, just wondering if anyone has told you about the mandatory ‚Äúspeech‚Äù required before your resignation is ‚Äúaccepted‚Äù, otherwise known as a ‚Äúfilibuster‚Äù. Which means you must maintain an ongoing uninterrupted oratory outlining and explaining why you are leaving while everyone objects/taunts/congratulates/or encourages you to stay. Well, just thought I should mention it because so few people read the small print.
item.content:encoded:
Well, Jim seems to be handling that well…

Oh, just wondering if anyone has told you about the mandatory ‚Äúspeech‚Äù required before your resignation is ‚Äúaccepted‚Äù, otherwise known as a ‚Äúfilibuster‚Äù. Which means you must maintain an ongoing uninterrupted oratory outlining and explaining why you are leaving while everyone objects/taunts/congratulates/or encourages you to stay. Well, just thought I should mention it because so few people read the small print.

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description:
What Warboss said! The IT cubes will be a little less lively come Monday. :(
Good luck, dude, and happy birthday to me -- NOT! ;)
